verses.name: Isaiah 53:1
verses.text: Who hath believed our report? and to whom is the arm of the Lord revealed?

verses.name: Isaiah 53:2
verses.text: For he shall grow up before him as a tender plant, and as a root out of a dry ground: he hath no form nor comeliness; and when we shall see him, there is no beauty that we should desire him.

verses.name: Isaiah 53:3
verses.text: He is despised and rejected of men; a man of sorrows, and acquainted with grief: and we hid as it were our faces from him; he was despised, and we esteemed him not.
